title: Ticket #747: Users have reported the Condor does not on Windows HPC
description: It has been reported that Condor does not well under Windows HPC.
remarks:
2009-Sep-18 03:15:19 by burnett:
First Trial Reproduction

SUMMARY

  • 1x Windows 2008 Domain Controller with a DNS server
  • 1x Windows 2008 HPC Server (no modifications to the HPC server's settings)
  • No jobs submitted to the HPC server

Under these conditions, a fresh install of the latest stable (7.2.4) and development (7.3.2) series of Condor ran correctly.

NOTES

This took about 6-8 hours to configure correctly using VMware Fusion on a Mac running OS X. The Windows 2008 Active Directory machine was assigned a static IP by touching the internals of the VMware DHCP server.

IDEAS

  • Hunt down the user with the problem and ask them for more details :)
  • Try submitting a few jobs to the HPC server, and see if this results in Condor misbehaving
  • Look for any options in the HPC Server settings that allows an Administrator to monitor network behaviour *:

2010-Jan-22 08:20:46 by tannenba:
As our attempt to reproduce the problem failed, going to resolve this ticket for now until/unless we get another report.
